abstract: was involved in a very smart discussion yesterday about the protests around Wall Street. Questions were raised: How does this inchoate movement compare with the birth of the Tea Party? Will the White House be able to harness the populist anger to bring about tax reform? Why are there so many bongos? And most important, what are the legislative aims of the protestors? What, after all, do they want?

headline.main: Occupy Wall Street's Tony Bennett Moment
